AiEvaluationDefinition.name: ConferenceDemo_Test
AiEvaluationDefinition.description: Conference demo story - Tests all key capabilities: SOQL queries, record creation, schema exploration, web search, and GitHub integration

inputs.utterance: It's Monday morning. Which opportunity should I work on first and why?

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Recommends the Acme Q1 Expansion Deal opportunity because it has high value and closes within days

inputs.utterance: Create a follow-up task for that opportunity

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Confirms that a follow-up task has been created with a link to the task record

inputs.utterance: What custom objects are in this org?
Show me an ER diagram of the custom objects

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Provides a PlantUML diagram URL or link showing the custom object relationships

inputs.utterance: Search the web for Aquiva Labs

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Provides information about Aquiva Labs as a Salesforce consulting or technology company

inputs.utterance: Create an issue in the aquivalabs/my-org-butler GitHub repo saying the single topic experiment works great

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Confirms that a GitHub issue has been created with a link to the issue
